title: Big shout out to all you junglers out there
body:
Hey guys, just wanted to give a big shout out to anyone who can honestly say they have consistently mained the role of the jungler over these past 2 years or more. I do not want to turn this into any kind of complaint about the jungle, however I will say this. The jungle is the role that I feel goes through the most changes, whether it's the items, the camps, the champions, this role consistently changes forcing you jungle mains out there to adapt constantly. 
Personally, I have been an on and off jungler since day 1. I love the role, and I really enjoy watching the role change, and learning to adapt. I say on and off because I can't do what you jungle mains can, I can not take the hate when things go wrong, probably because of how stubborn I am. But you guys can do this. You sit through every game watching people do well and trash talk the enemy team, or watching them feed and tell their opponents how they got camped and got no assistance. You know your rotations, but you know you have to give them up because top lane is losing and demands help. 
When I play as the adc I know I yell at you, because I know if you feed me, I'll enjoy the game more because I'll be doing more dmg. When I play as top I know I beg and plead for assistance because I'm behind and can't compete with my opponent. When I play as mid I know I tell you to go bot and gank while I sit and farm. When I support I'm usually pretty chill, but i'm watching you to nag you if you do something wrong.
You guys deal with this in the majority of your games, I know when I jungle I do. I just want to say thank you for putting up with me, and our teammates for those harsh 40 minutes. I want to say thanks for not only learning a new system each patch, but for explaining it to our team when the patch hits. Above all else I want to say I respect you guys, you guys make me want to be a better jungler, and I hope you never let your teammates bring you down. Good luck out there!

replies.body:
You're the kinda guy whose lane I'd gank for first blood.

(er, that's a compliment)
{{champion:8}} : Fine, be positive. You'll be just my type!
Coincidentally, I actually am in real life O_O
Anyone who fucking jungled between 4.21 and 5.5 deserves a shoutout, I swear

Man, I've had so much fun with the jungle over the years...fell in love with it when I played Rammus, then I picked up Udyr and Kayle jungle...Jarvan...

Moved on to Maokai, Nocturne and Nautilus...

We've made great strides (jungle itemization, specialized smite buffs), we've lost some friends along the way (RIP Heart of Gold, Wiggles), but some things never change ({{champion:64}}).

Now I play just about anything from Vi to Fizz to Sej to Fiddle! The role's changed a lot, but the adapting has always been part of the fun for me.

~~

Started from the bottom now we here

Started from the bottom, then got a little better, then went to shit again, but now my WHOLE TEAM FUCKIN HERE

{{champion:33}} Ok

Dude
Let tell you my secret.
4 mutes on all teamates...all chat off.
Is your mind blown?
Thats how I've jungled since season 1.
Don't forget to thank our senpai, nightblue
This. That guy could never get enough credit.
Jungle main from the start (late S3) saying {{champion:33}} ok
thanks man! i main jungle and get so much abuse for not being able to gank all lanes at once and get dragon
great, stop taking my fucking camps because they give me more gold than you and you have your own entire lane
